longBusinessSummary: BEENOS Inc. engages in the e-commerce business in Japan and internationally. The company operates through E-Commerce, Incubation, and Other segments. It operates e-commerce business through BEENOS; overseas forwarding through tenso.com; internet shopping through Shop Airlines; and Brandear, which offers consumer-based delivery buyback services. The company also offers alcoholic beverages on platform through JOYLAB; business development services through BeeCruise; fashion items, interior goods, and cosmetics through FASBEE, as well as provides Travel Bar, a travel media site; and operates transportation service through FanVas. In addition, the company offers Groobee, a service that allows a business to create an E-Commerce website; narabee, a mobile order/payment service; and chord, a music album services. Further, it offers BAKUMO, a business marketing platform; operates Linkus, a SaaS type cross border HR platform, as well as operates BEENOSTORM, a e-sports team. Additionally, the company operates hotel reservation services and involved in proxy purchasing service through Buyee. Furthermore, it is involved in the investment and startup businesses. BEENOS Inc. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
